edu.uncc.cs.bridgesV2.base

Class Edge

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uncc.cs.bridgesV2.base.Edge
  • Type Parameters:
    E - 

    public class Edge
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to assign a visual connection between two Elements in the Bridges Visualization.

    Bridges will represent these as arrows between two Elements. The starting Element of the arrow will be referred to as the source Element and the ending Element of the arrow will be referred to as the terminating Element.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Edge()
      Construct an edge with no terminating Element - used only for graphs
      Edge(int wt)
      Construct an edge with thickness equal to "wt" and no terminating Element - used only for graphs.
      Edge(int wt, java.lang.String v)
      Construct an edge with thickness equal to "wt" and a terminating Element with an identifer equal to "v" - used only for graphs
